name: LUMINIS PHOTO STUDIO
Overview: A Complete website for photo shooting and photo service,Single-page app (SPA) Authentication with firebase, and authorization with JWT Token this application has a private route and also has a user review section Users can add, delete update a review, and can also add a service

name: CyberCodeDev
Overview: A Complete website for E-Learning Platforms and Online Courses,Single-page app (SPA) Authentication with firebase, and authorization with JWT Token this application has a private route and also has a user review section Users can add, delete update a review, and can also add a service Implemented theme toggler from light mode to dark mode Authentication maintained via Firebase.
Technologies: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Mongodb, Firebase, TailwindCss, daisyUi,

name: QUIZ QUIP
Overview: A Complete website for online quiz Single-page app (SPA) Show quiz topic on the home page Use the eye button on the quiz section to show the right answer Show quiz data analysis using recharts
Technologies: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, TailwindCss, daisyUi, React Toastify, React recharts
